quote: Leadership is not about being in charge. It's about taking care of those in your charge.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: A good leader leads the people from above them. A great leader leads the people from within them.
author: Mabel Newcomer

quote: Leadership is the capacity to translate vision into reality.
author: Warren Bennis

quote: The quality of a leader is reflected in the standards they set for themselves.
author: Ray Kroc

quote: Leadership is not about being the best. It's about making everyone else better.
author: Anonymous

quote: A true leader doesn't create followers, they create more leaders.
author: Anonymous

quote: Leadership is not about being the boss, it's about showing the way.
author: Anonymous

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Leadership is about influence, not authority.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Leadership is the ability to get extraordinary achievement from ordinary people.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: The greatest leader is not necessarily the one who does the greatest things. He is the one that gets the people to do the greatest things.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Leadership is unlocking people's potential to become better.
author: Bill Bradley

quote: A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: You don't lead by pointing and telling people where to go. You lead by going to that place and making a case.
author: Ken Kesey

quote: The challenge of leadership is to be strong, but not rude; be kind, but not weak; be bold, but not bully; be thoughtful, but not lazy; be humble, but not timid; be proud, but not arrogant.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Leadership is the art of giving people a platform for spreading ideas that work.
author: Seth Godin

quote: Great leaders are not defined by the absence of weakness, but rather by the presence of clear strengths.
author: John Zenger

quote: The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.
author: Ralph Nader

quote: The key to successful leadership is influence, not authority.
author: Kenneth H. Blanchard

quote: Leadership is not about being in charge. It's about taking care of those in your charge.

author: Ken Kesey

author: Jim Rohn

author: Seth Godin

quote: Great leaders are not defined by the absence of weakness, but rather by the presence of clear strengths.
author: John Zenger

quote: The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.
author: Ralph Nader

quote: The key to successful leadership is influence, not authority.
author: Kenneth H. Blanchard

quote: To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right–for you'll be criticized anyway.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: A leader takes people where they want to go. A great leader takes people where they don’t necessarily want to go, but ought to be.
author: Rosalynn Carter

quote: True leaders understand that leadership is not about them but about those they serve.
author: Anonymous

quote: The task of the leader is to get their people from where they are to where they have not been.
author: Henry Kissinger

quote: The function of a leader is to produce more leaders, not more followers.
author: Ralph Nader

quote: Great leaders are willing to sacrifice their own personal interests for the good of the team.
author: John Wooden

quote: Leadership and learning are indispensable to each other.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: People ask the difference between a leader and a boss. The leader leads, and the boss drives.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: A great person attracts great people and knows how to hold them together.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Leadership is not about titles, positions, or flowcharts. It is about one life influencing another.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more, and become more, you are a leader.
author: John Quincy Adams

quote: Earn your leadership every day.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Effective leadership is not about making speeches or being liked; leadership is defined by results, not attributes.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: A leader is best when people barely know he exists, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: A true leader has the confidence to stand alone, the courage to make tough decisions, and the compassion to listen to the needs of others.
author: Douglas MacArthur

quote: Leadership is not a position or title, it is action and example.
author: Cory Booker

quote: The speed of the leader is the speed of the gang.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: Don’t find fault, find a remedy.
author: Henry Ford

quote: A leader’s job is not to do the work for others, it’s to help others figure out how to do it themselves, to get things done, and to succeed beyond what they thought possible.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: The only safe ship in a storm is leadership.
author: Faye Wattleton
